Function	Forms a receptor-activated non-selective calcium permeant cation channel. Acts as a cell-cell contact-dependent endothelial calcium entry channel. Probably operated by a phosphatidylinositol second messenger system activated by receptor tyrosine kinases or G-protein coupled receptors (PubMed:11042129, PubMed:11713258, PubMed:16144838, PubMed:19996314). May also be activated by intracellular calcium store depletion (By similarity).
